name: check-phish
label: Check Phish
description: CheckPhish is free scanner to detect phishing & fraudulent sites in real-time.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The URL of the Check Phish server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The API Key used to access the Check Phis server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify the URL for which you need to retrieve the  information.

parameters.title: Scan Type
parameters.name: scanType
parameters.description: Select the scan type. Available options are Quick and Full.

parameters.title: Insights
parameters.name: insights
parameters.tooltip: If insights: true in the query then it insight, Screenshot Path and resolved additional fields will returned in response.
parameters.description: If insights: true in the query then it insight, Screenshot Path and resolved additional fields will returned in response.
